attributes.review: So I downloaded this app. It took 3-5 business days to download. Once it finally downloaded, it made me take a survey. One of the questions asked me if I supported Trump. I said Iâ€™m not sure at the moment. Then it asked me if I had any medical conditions. I selected epilepsy because i often have epileptic episodes in reaction to flickering lights. Then, the app started flickering and sent me into another epileptic episode, resulting in a major stroke. I am still in recovery months later, and I am now able to physically write this review. After the flickering, the app told me, â€œYou shouldâ€™ve picked trump immediatelyâ€. Then it sent a virus into my phone which erased all my prewritten love letters to Rudy Pankow in my secret photo vault, and my cart on amazon that contained my 10 week medicine supply for my Chlamydia. This app ruined my life. Donâ€™t download it... before itâ€™s too late for you. Stay safe.
